description: Single source of truth for ALL Claude Code components in this repository

deploymentLevels.global: Installed to ~/.claude/ via symlinks, available to all projects on device
deploymentLevels.template: Copied to projects via deploy-template.sh, project-specific configurations
deploymentLevels.staging: Work-in-progress, not yet promoted to global or template
deploymentLevels.experiment: Exploratory ideas, may never be promoted
deploymentLevels.deprecated: Scheduled for removal, kept for reference

statusLevels.beta: Functional but may have rough edges
statusLevels.experiment: Proof of concept, not for production use
statusLevels.deprecated: No longer maintained, will be removed
